title.narrative: Pink human rights defender NGO - Armenia 2021-2024

description.narrative:
Pink Human Rights Defender NGO (Pink) has applied to Sida for funding of 9 000 000 SEK, to carry out "Advancing the movement through sustainable development" project during the period of 2021-2024.
The intervention aims to provide a programme support to Pink 1) to strengthen LGBTQI community and movement for raising the community demands and to empower actors of change; 2) to change the attitudes of the society towards LGBTQI issues through evidence-based communication; 3) to advocate for legal and policy changes for ensuring inclusiveness of addressing LGBTQI human rights; 4) to ensure the sustainability of the organization and staff capacity. The intervention will be implemented through a programme support to Pink and forwarding of funds to the third parties.
The intervention’s total budget is 9 000 000 SEK, out of which the organization’s own funding is 8 000 000 SEK (800 000 USD) and the remaining 1 000 000 SEK (100 000 USD) will be forwarding of funds to the third parties.

The intervention will be implemented through a programme support to Pink and forwarding of funds to the third parties.
The intervention’s total budget is 9 000 000 SEK, out of which the organization’s own funding is 8 000 000 SEK (800 000 USD) and the remaining 1 000 000 SEK (100 000 USD) will be forwarding of funds to the third parties.

tag.narrative: 10.4 - Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality.
10.4 - Besluta om politik, särskilt finans-, löne- och socialskyddspolitik, och successivt uppnå ökad jämlikhet.
5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
5.c - Adopt and strengthen sound policies and enforceable legislation for the promotion of gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls at all levels.
5.c - Anta och stärka välgrundad politik och genomförbar lagstiftning för att främja jämställdhet och öka alla kvinnors och flickors egenmakt på alla nivåer

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative:
y the end of the intervention, it is expected to achieve the following results;
- Increased level of LGBTQI's human rights protection in Armenia.
- LGBTQI movement is strengthened through ensured access to safe spaces, full package of services, capacity building opportunities and support to LGBTQI people and NGOs.
- Evidence-based communication on human rights and LGBTQI related topics is improved through continuous awareness raising and extended collaboration network with supporters, allies, partner organizations and coalitions.
- LGBTQI human rights are addressed in legal and policy changes through evidence-based communication and advocacy activities.
- Sustainability of the organization and staff capacity is maintained through periodic assessments, reflection, learning and capacity building activities.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
